testcase.name: Get the userdetails of id 2
testcase.system-out: * url 'https://reqres.in' ................................................. passed * header Accept = 'application/json' ...................................... passed * def response_expected = read('../utils/result2.json') ................... passed Given path '/api/users/2' ................................................. passed When method GET ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed Then print 'Users from the GET API', response_expected[0] ................. passed And match response == response_expected[0] ................................ passed And match response.data.first_name == 'Janet' ............................. passed And match response.data.last_name != null ................................. passed * def designation = response.data.designation ............................. passed And match designation == null ............................................. passed
